title: R.A.A.F. Newsreel. No. 13. The Queen and the R.A.A.F
creator_credit: Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Public Relations and H Rayner
brief_description: Screen magazine: Commemorates the important part played by the R.A.A.F. during the visit of Her Majesty the Queen and His Royal Highness, the Duke of Edinburgh to Australia, February 1963. Providing air transport in an R.A.A.F. Convair; immaculate guards of honour; exhibitions of precise formation flying and performance by the R.A.A.F. Central Band.
